data.text: Early to bed, early to fangirl―― ...I mean, it's 5AM early.
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: Early to bed, early to fangirl―― ...I mean, it's 5AM early.

data.text:
Good morning, Trainer-san!! 
And thank you... Thank you so much for coming!!!!!!
data.name: Agnes Digital

choices.text: Someone's in a good mood this early.
Someone's in a good mood this early.

data.processed:
<story>Good morning, Trainer-san!! 
<story>And thank you... Thank you so much for coming!!!!!!

data.text:
I sure am! Because today, we're showing our fandom by going on 
a "Holy Site Pilgrimage"!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>I sure am! Because today, we're showing our fandom by going on 
<story>a "Holy Site Pilgrimage"!

data.text:
Umamusume-chans each have their own life stories... Their own 
tales of drama and woe. Today's fangirling spree is a tour of 
places where these dramas made their mark.
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Umamusume-chans each have their own life stories... Their own 
<story>tales of drama and woe. Today's fangirling spree is a tour of 
<story>places where these dramas made their mark.

data.text:
To be honest, I want to spend a whole month checking them out, 
but I still have to race! So we're gonna use every second of our 
day off!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>To be honest, I want to spend a whole month checking them out, 
<story>but I still have to race! So we're gonna use every second of our 
<story>day off!

data.text: Time is limited! But my love for my faves is infinite! So without further ado, let's get right to it!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: Time is limited! But my love for my faves is infinite! So without further ado, let's get right to it!

data.text:
Here's our first stop! Look, a farm――No, sorry, this flower field! 
AKA the Garden of Pwecious Rest (Open paranthesis name by 
Digitan close paranthesis) !
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Here's our first stop! Look, a farm――No, sorry, this flower field! 
<story>AKA the Garden of Pwecious Rest (Open paranthesis name by 
<story>Digitan close paranthesis) !

data.text:
There's a bit of folk wisdom saying the flowers here can be used 
to confess the feelings that words never could.
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>There's a bit of folk wisdom saying the flowers here can be used 
<story>to confess the feelings that words never could.

data.text:
So many Umamusume-chans have given white clovers to the 
girls they call their rivals, and guess what...!!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>So many Umamusume-chans have given white clovers to the 
<story>girls they call their rivals, and guess what...!!

data.text:
What's that mean in flower language?―― You guessed it! 
"Think of me"!! "Promise me"!! They're promising to devote all 
their feelings to each ooootthhheeeerrrrrr.....
data.name: Agnes Digital

choices.text: Really does sound like a drama.
Really does sound like a drama.

data.processed:
<story>What's that mean in flower language?―― You guessed it! 
<story>"Think of me"!! "Promise me"!! They're promising to devote all 
<story>their feelings to each ooootthhheeeerrrrrr.....

data.text:
S O T R U E ! 
You get it! Your understanding runs as deep as the Strait of 
Dover~!!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>S O T R U E ! 
<story>You get it! Your understanding runs as deep as the Strait of 
<story>Dover~!!

data.text:
And here we are! The playground also known as The Little 
Racetrack of Sisterhood!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>And here we are! The playground also known as The Little 
<story>Racetrack of Sisterhood!

data.text:
Hayahide-san fact: She used to race a lot against her little sister 
Brian-san when they were kids.
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Hayahide-san fact: She used to race a lot against her little sister 
<story>Brian-san when they were kids.

data.text:
The two are sisters, yet rivals too. 
Doesn't that backstory get you literally shaking? ...Don't you 
just want to run!?
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>The two are sisters, yet rivals too. 
<story>Doesn't that backstory get you literally shaking? ...Don't you 
<story>just want to run!?

data.text:
Well, now I've got to, don't I?!! Time to go full delulu and 
experience our faves through imagination! This, too, is the 
fangirl's path!! YEAAAAAAHHHHH!!!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Well, now I've got to, don't I?!! Time to go full delulu and 
<story>experience our faves through imagination! This, too, is the 
<story>fangirl's path!! YEAAAAAAHHHHH!!!

data.text: Bwahhh~~~!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: <story>Bwahhh~~~!

data.text:
Yum! Yum! YUM! 
So this is the taste of The King's Ramen!!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Yum! Yum! YUM! 
<story>So this is the taste of The King's Ramen!!

data.text: Plus! ...the... sheer size of these portions... woo!!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: Plus! ...the... sheer size of these portions... woo!!

data.text:
...N-No wonder they call it the King's Ramen. One who conquers 
the ramen... bears the crown―― 
...Hough...
data.name: Agnes Digital

choices.text: Y-you don't have to finish the whole thing!
choices.processed: <size=38>Y-you don't have to finish the whole thing!</size>

data.processed:
<story>...N-No wonder they call it the King's Ramen. One who conquers 
<story>the ramen... bears the crown―― 
<story>...Hough...

data.text:
Nay! Far too many lives have been laid down in pursuit of this 
throne... I must... get a taste... of their dreams...
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Nay! Far too many lives have been laid down in pursuit of this 
<story>throne... I must... get a taste... of their dreams...

data.text: Houhsfgl.
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: <story>Houhsfgl.

data.text:
Even after that ordeal, she continued her journey with all her 
might. 
After all that――
data.processed:
<story>Even after that ordeal, she continued her journey with all her 
<story>might. 
<story>After all that――

data.text:
――Okay! Now that we've checked out the honey drink stall, 
the pilgrimage... is complete!
data.name: Agnes Digital

choices.text: We really went all over the place, huh.
choices.processed: <size=43>We really went all over the place, huh.</size>

choices.text: We really went all over the place, huh.
choices.processed: <size=43>We really went all over the place, huh.</size>

data.processed:
<story>――Okay! Now that we've checked out the honey drink stall, 
<story>the pilgrimage... is complete!

data.text:
Whew~! What a long fangirling journey it's been, for real~! 
Nice hustle, soldier! Salute!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Whew~! What a long fangirling journey it's been, for real~! 
<story>Nice hustle, soldier! Salute!

data.text:
And... Hehe, I'm glad you got to enjoy yourself without getting 
messed up.
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>And... Hehe, I'm glad you got to enjoy yourself without getting 
<story>messed up.

data.text:
To be honest, I was planning on doing this by myself like I 
always do, but――
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>To be honest, I was planning on doing this by myself like I 
<story>always do, but――

data.text:
Okily dokily, finished the itinerary for my pilgrimage ☆ 
Muhuhuuuu. Can't wait to bring Trainer-san a souvenir~♪
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Okily dokily, finished the itinerary for my pilgrimage ☆ 
<story>Muhuhuuuu. Can't wait to bring Trainer-san a souvenir~♪

data.text:
Haha, no idea what you're talking about, but you're looking as 
chipper as ever!
data.name: Umamusume Classmate
data.processed:
<story>Haha, no idea what you're talking about, but you're looking as 
<story>chipper as ever!

data.text:
Whoa! W... Was I saying all that out loud....!? 
Sorry for botherin' ya, bud...!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Whoa! W... Was I saying all that out loud....!? 
<story>Sorry for botherin' ya, bud...!

data.text:
Actually, you mentioned a souvenir... So you're not going 
together with your trainer? On your, uh... pilgrimage... thing?
data.name: Umamusume Classmate
data.processed:
<story>Actually, you mentioned a souvenir... So you're not going 
<story>together with your trainer? On your, uh... pilgrimage... thing?

data.text:
Beh!? I- I didn't even think of that! 
...A pilgrimage... together...!?
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Beh!? I- I didn't even think of that! 
<story>...A pilgrimage... together...!?

data.text: Wh.... Whhuwhwuhwuwhuhuhhhh~!!??
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: <story>Wh.... Whhuwhwuhwuwhuhuhhhh~!!??

data.text:
And here we are! I've gotta say, it was actually 
ssssssssssssssssssssssssu...
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>And here we are! I've gotta say, it was actually 
<story>ssssssssssssssssssssssssu...

data.text: ....uuuuuper duper fun~!
data.name: Agnes Digital

choices.text: I had fun too. Thanks for inviting me.
I had fun too. Thanks for inviting me.

data.processed: <story>....uuuuuper duper fun~!

data.text:
Thank goodness... It was your one day off, and you had to get up 
super early, so I totally thought you'd say no!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Thank goodness... It was your one day off, and you had to get up 
<story>super early, so I totally thought you'd say no!

data.text: Great scott! I've got the discovery of the century!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: <story>Great scott! I've got the discovery of the century!

data.text:
I finally figured it out, see? 
The joy of fangirling together with you, Trainer-san!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>I finally figured it out, see? 
<story>The joy of fangirling together with you, Trainer-san!

data.text: I didn't even think there was a single person on the whole planet who'd go along with my fandom so much!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: I didn't even think there was a single person on the whole planet who'd go along with my fandom so much!

data.text:
No, no, no! I'm sure you've figured out by now that I'm the type 
to just go off on my own all the time, yeah?
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>No, no, no! I'm sure you've figured out by now that I'm the type 
<story>to just go off on my own all the time, yeah?

data.text: Going along with my crazy talk is one thing but, actually, really getting it!? It just makes me so happy...!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: Going along with my crazy talk is one thing but, actually, really getting it!? It just makes me so happy...!

data.text: Nowadays, whenever I get all "The feels are hitting too hard I just can't even~!", I have to go talk to you about it!
data.name: Agnes Digital

choices.text: Anything you want to talk about, I'll listen.
choices.processed: <size=39>Anything you want to talk about, I'll listen.</size>

choices.text: Anything you want to talk about, I'll listen.
choices.processed: <size=39>Anything you want to talk about, I'll listen.</size>

data.processed: Nowadays, whenever I get all "The feels are hitting too hard I just can't even~!", I have to go talk to you about it!

data.text: What....!? A-a-a-a-anything!?
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: <story>What....!? A-a-a-a-anything!?

data.text: Are you sure? ...Are you SURE?? You gave me the OK, right??? Then get ready for more of Digitan's Crazy Tal――
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: Are you sure? ...Are you SURE?? You gave me the OK, right??? Then get ready for more of Digitan's Crazy Tal――

data.text: ...STOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOP!!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: ...STOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOP!!

data.text: L-look... Over there...
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: <story>L-look... Over there...

data.text:
Vodka-san and Daiwa Scarlet-san!? 
Over there, by the bridge! Looks like they're talking...
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>Vodka-san and Daiwa Scarlet-san!? 
<story>Over there, by the bridge! Looks like they're talking...

data.text: Ah! Is this the birth of a brand new holy site!?
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: <story>Ah! Is this the birth of a brand new holy site!?

data.text: What are you doing, don't just stand there, Trainer-san! We gotta go! Dash, dash!!!!!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: What are you doing, don't just stand there, Trainer-san! We gotta go! Dash, dash!!!!!

data.text:
She ran off before I could even get a word in. 
If that's how it was going to be, there was nothing I could do but 
follow behind.
data.processed:
<story>She ran off before I could even get a word in. 
<story>If that's how it was going to be, there was nothing I could do but 
<story>follow behind.

title: Re: There's just too many holy lands ♪
